= Setting Up Your Sina Weibo Development Environment =

No matter which operating system you are using, you will need essentially the same set of tools:

  * [JDK Sun's Java Development Kit (JDK)]

  * [Eclipse The Eclipse Integrated Development Environment]

  * [AndroidSDK The Android Software Developer's Kit (SDK)]

  * [ADT A special Eclipse plugin: the Android Developer Tool (ADT)]

  * [Subclipse A subversion plugin for Eclipse: Subclipse]

  * [SinaWeiboSDK The Sina Weibo Developer's Kit (SDK)]
